signals: The only B2B food waste solutions

valueProps.text: Reduce food waste and improve sustainability goals
Real-time food tracking platform for ESG compliance
Automated redistribution logistics for food donations
AI-powered data platform for insights and action

pains: Mismatch in food systems leading to waste
Cities struggling to meet food waste reduction goals
Lack of tools for efficient food redistribution

facts.text: One third of all produced food goes to waste
facts.evidence: One third of all produced food goes to waste while millions of people cannot afford quality meals.

facts.text: Zipli offers a real-time food tracking platform
facts.evidence: Meet climate, food waste, and social policy targets by utilizing Zipli's real-time food tracking platform and communication tool.

facts.text: Zipli helps cut waste costs and improve ESG compliance
facts.evidence: Cut waste costs, strengthen ESG compliance, and improve social wellbeing.
Reduce disposal costs and simplify food donations by automating redistribution logistics and compliance.

facts.text: Zipli provides AI-based recommendations to reduce waste
facts.evidence: And on top of it all, we provide users AI-based recommendations on measures to take to further reduce waste and meet impact goals.

facts.text: Zipli's mobile app matches food offers and requests
facts.page: Mobile app for every-day food matchmaking
facts.evidence: Our mobile app solves the daily headache of redirecting excess food to people in need.

facts.text: Zipli's platform offers real-time insights for decision-makers
facts.page: AI-powered data platform for overview, insights and action
facts.evidence: Whether you are a public sector decision-maker, a food waste coordinator or a restaurant chain manager, our real-time insights will help you get an overview on food flows and detailed data on your positive impact.

facts.text: Zipli provides auto-generated reports for ESG tracking
facts.page: AI-powered data platform for overview, insights and action
facts.evidence: Use our auto-generated reports for ESG tracking and faster stakeholder communications.

facts.text: Zipli helps food producers turn surplus into savings
facts.evidence: Turn extra food into good use by making donations easier to handle and report. Save money, do good for the planet, follow food donation rules and get the data you need for ESG reporting.

facts.text: Charities get reliable access to surplus food through Zipli
facts.evidence: Get access to consistent and diverse supply of surplus food. Reduce sourcing stress, lower costs, and focus on creating more impact - or new food innovations for the world to enjoy!
